author: Staff Reporter
text:
The British Council Language Centre, Chennai, is organising classes for people in different age groups. Registrations are open for courses as part of their new term starting in March 2016.

The courses offered to people above 16 years of age are general English, spoken English, business English, IELTS exam preparation and teacher training. For children between the ages of 8 and 15, there are young achievers’ courses, speak out right course and young learner’s workshops. Early applicants will receive priority on availability of courses and class timings. For details, contact Ph: 01204569000/ 01206684353 and email Winya.Suzanna@in.britishcouncil.org or SMS ‘English’ to 567678.
title: Language courses by British Council
